meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds containing two carbon-to-carbon double bonds.
meanings.sent1: In chemistry class, we learned about dienes and their unique structure.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the properties of various dienes in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The dienes at the party were the most reactive molecules on the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity flowed like dienes, connecting ideas in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used colorful models to explain the concept of dienes to the students.
